0:
player_limit: -1
ip_forward: true

  - bungeecord.command.list
  - alert.trigger
  - slashserver.lobby
  - slashserver.survival
  - slashserver.survival2

  - bungeecord.command.alert

  - bungeecord.command.ip
  - bungeecord.command.reload
  - alert.receive
  - alert.receive.firstjoin
  - alert.command.toggle
  - alert.command.reload

  - bungeecord.server.survival
timeout: 30000
log_pings: true
log_commands: false
online_mode: true
servers:

    motd: '&1eviljungle lobby'

  creative:

    restricted: false

    address: mcsv-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
  survival2:

    address: mcsv2-minecraft:25565
    restricted: false
listeners:
- query_port: 25577
  motd: '&3eviljungle &6&Llobby'
  priorities:
  - lobby
  bind_local_address: true
  tab_list: GLOBAL_PING
  query_enabled: true
  host: 0.0.0.0:25577
ping_passthrough: true
groups:
  billimek:
  - admin
  - family
  AnsleyElla:
  - family
  BrinleyHarper:
  - family

        /^adtrack(er|ing)?[0-9]*[_.-]/
        /^advert(s|is(ing|ements?))?[0-9]*[_.-]/
        /^aff(iliat(es?|ion))?[_.-]/
        /^analytics?[_.-]/
        /^banners?[_.-]/
        /^beacons?[0-9]*[_.-]/
        /^count(ers?)?[0-9]*[_.-]/
        /^mads\./
        /^pixels?[-.]/
        /^stat(s|istics)?[0-9]*[_.-]/

    ads:
      - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/anudeepND/whitelist/master/domains/whitelist.txt

clientLookup:

httpPort: 4000

    - https://dns.quad9.net/dns-query
    - https://protected.canadianshield.cira.ca/dns-query


upstreamTimeout: 2s

conditional:

blocking:

      - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/crazy-max/WindowsSpyBlocker/master/data/hosts/spy.txt
      - https://www.github.developerdan.com/hosts/lists/ads-and-tracking-extended.txt
    noblock: []

  clientGroupsBlock:

      - ads

    192.168.1.129/32:
      - noblock

      - noblock
    192.168.1.249/32:

clientLookup:

caching:

  maxTime: 5m
  cacheTimeNegative: -1m

/hr/ghcr.io-prometheus-community-charts-.title: snmp-exporter-dell-idrac helm release
/hr/ghcr.io-prometheus-community-charts-.name: snmp-exporter-dell-idrac
/hr/ghcr.io-prometheus-community-charts-.doc:
To monitor Dell iDRAC devices with Prometheus, you can use the SNMP Exporter and use it with the snmp.yml configuration file.

Below you can find other users from our community that have already configured the SNMP Exporter for Dell iDRAC devices. Click on their repository links to see their helm release and in the same directory you should find a config map with the snmp.yml configuration file.

0:
mqtt:
  host: mosquitto
  topic_prefix: frigate
  user: "${SECRET_MQTT_USERNAME}"
  password: "${SECRET_MQTT_PASSWORD}"

database:
  path: /data/frigate.db

# Global objects configuration
objects:
  track:
    - person
    - dog
    - cat
    - bird
  filters:
    bird:
      mask:
        - 0,286,0,0,1280,0,1280,403,1188,378
    person:
      min_area: 2500
      max_area: 100000
      threshold: 0.7

detectors:
  coral:
    type: edgetpu
    device: usb

# Global ffmpeg configuration
ffmpeg:
  hwaccel_args:
    - -hwaccel
    - vaapi
    - -hwaccel_device
    - /dev/dri/renderD128
    - -hwaccel_output_format
    - yuv420p
  output_args:
    record: -f segment -segment_time 10 -segment_format mp4 -reset_timestamps 1 -strftime 1 -c:v copy -c:a aac

rtmp:
  enabled: true

snapshots:
  enabled: true
  timestamp: false
  bounding_box: true
  retain:
    default: 10

record:
  enabled: true
  retain:
    days: 2
    mode: motion
  events:
    retain:
      default: 7
      mode: active_objects


# Cameras
cameras:
  # --
  frigate_backyard:
    ffmpeg:
      inputs:
      - path: "rtsp://${SECRET_FRIGATE_CAMERA_AUTH}@10.20.30.151/Streaming/Channels/101/"
        roles:
          - rtmp
          - record
          # - detect
  # --
